GK16andhvc4u:545: guṇībhūtvayaṅgyasyāpi tribhedavyaṅgyāpekṣayā ye prakārāstatsamāśrayeṇāpi kāvyavastūnāṃ navatvaṃ bhavatyeva /
GK16andhvc4u:548: rathyāyāntulāgreṇa kākatālīyena pratilagnassā mukhyena sa pārśvo 'dyāpi subhaga tasyā yenāsyatikrāntaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:552_1: dhvaneradhvanā kavīnāṃ pratibhāguṇo 'nanto bhavatotyeṣa bhāgo vyākhyāta ityupasaṃharati--tadevamityādinā /
GK16andhvc4u:554: triprabhedo vastvalaṅkārarasātmanā yo vyaṅgyaḥ tasya yāpekṣā vācyeguṇībhāvaḥ tayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:555: tatra sarve ye dhvanibhedāsteṣāṃ guṇībhāvādānantyamiti tadāha--ativistareti /
GK16andhvc4u:557: tatra vastunā vyaṅgyena guṇībhūtena navatvaṃ satyapa purāṇārthasparśe yathā mamaiva-- bhaavihalarakhkhaṇekakamallasaraṇāgaāṇaaththāṇa /
GK16andhvc4u:559: atra tvamanavaratamarthāstyajasīti audāryalakṣaṇaṃ vastu dhvanyamānaṃ vācyasyopaskārakaṃ bālapriyā tribhedavyaṅgyāpekṣayetyetadvyācaṣṭe--triprabheda ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:569: alaṅkāreṇa vyaṅgyena vācyopaskāre navatvaṃ yathā mamaiva-- vasantamattāliparamparopamāḥ kacāstavāsan kala rāgavṛddhaye /
GK16andhvc4u:571: atra hyākṣepeṇa vibhāvanayā ca dhvanyamānābhyāṃ vācyamupaskṛtamiti navatvaṃ satyapi purāṇārthayogitve /
GK16andhvc4u:575: vyaṅgyena rasena guṇībhūtena vācyopaskāreṇa navatvaṃ yathā mameva-- jarā neyaṃ mūrdhni dhruvamayamasau kālabhujagaḥ krudhāndhaḥ phūtkāraiḥ sphuṭagaralaphenān prakirati // //
GK16andhvc4u:576: tadenaṃ saṃpaśyatyatha ca sukhitammanyahṛdayaḥ śivo pāyannecchan bata bata sudhīraḥ khalu janaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:583: vasante vasantena vā mattā ye alayo bhṛṅgāstatparamparopamāḥ teṣāṃ paramparayā tulyāḥ atinīlasnigdhā iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:586: śmaśānabhūbhāge ye parāgāḥ bhasmareṇavaste iva bhāsurāḥ śubhrāḥ jarayā śuklā iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:589: tava manāgīṣadupi viraktaye vairāgyāya na bhavanti /
GK16andhvc4u:590: tat tathaṃ vairāgyasya kāraṇe satyapi tadajananaṃ kuta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:591: anena pratyuta kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāma eva vardhanta ityarthasya kāmasya mahimā varṇayitumaśakya ityarthasya ca prakāśanādvibhāvanākṣepau vyajyete,
GK16andhvc4u:596: mūrdhni iyaṃ dṛśyamānā jarā na bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:600: phūtkāraiḥ sphuṭaṃ garalaṃ yeṣu tathābhūtān phenān prakirati varṣati /
GK16andhvc4u:601: iyaṃ na jarā, kintu śirasthakālabhujagābhivṛṣṭaḥ phenanikara
GK16andhvc4u:604: na kāvyārtha-virāmo 'sti yadi syāt pratibhā-guṇaḥ // DhvK_4.6 //
GK16andhvc4u:612_1: vācyamupaskṛtaṃ śāntarasapratipatyaṅgatvāccāru bhavatīti navatvaṃ satyapyasmin purāṇaśloke
GK16andhvc4u:615: trīn pādān spaṣṭānmatvā turyaṃ pādaṃ vyākhyātuṃ paṭhati--yadīti /
GK16andhvc4u:616: vidyamāno hyasau pratibhāgaṇa uktarītyā bhūyān bhavati, na tvatyantāsannevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:620: sarva hi purāṇakavinaiva spṛṣṭamiti kimidānīṃ varṇyaṃ, yatra kavervarṇanāvyāpārassyāt /
GK16andhvc4u:633: sampaśyati atha ca sukhitamanyahṛdayaḥ śivopāyaṃ necchaṃśca /
GK16andhvc4u:645: itīdaṃ sahṛdayānāṃ na nedīya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:658: śabdārthayoḥ sāhityena kāvyatve kathaṃ tathāvidhe viṣaye kāvyavyavastheti cet---paropanibaddhārthaviracane yathā tatkāvyatvavyavahārastathā tathāvidhānāṃ kāvyasandarbhāṇām /
GK16andhvc4u:662: ānantyam eva vācyasya śuddhasyāpi svabhāvataḥ // DhvK_4.7 //
GK16andhvc4u:667: svabhāvo hyayaṃ vācyānāṃ cetanānāmacetanānāṃ ca yadavasthābhedāddeśabhedātkālabhedātsvālakṣaṇyabhedāccānantatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:668: taiśca tathāvyavasthitaiḥ sadbhiḥ prasiddhānekasvabhāvānusaraṇarūpayā svabhāvoktyāpi tāvadupanibadhyamānairniravadhiḥ locanam caturatvaṃ samāsasaṅghaṭanā /
GK16andhvc4u:673: na tvayaṃ bhāvapratyayāntāt bhāvapratyaya iti śaṅkitavyam // 6 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:676: yadi vā vācyantābadvividhavyaṅgyopayogi tadeva cedanantaṃ tadbalādeva vyaṅgyānantyaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇedaṃ prakṛtamevocyate /
GK16andhvc4u:678: vyaṅgyaviṣayo yo vyāpāraḥ tatsparśaṃ vināpyānantyaṃ svarūpamātreṇaiva paścāttu tathā svarūpeṇānantaṃ sadvyaṅgyaṃ vyanaktīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:679: na tu sarvathā tatra vyaṅgyaṃ nāstīti mantavyamātmabhūtatadrūpābhāve kāvyavyavahārahāneḥ;
GK16andhvc4u:700: saiva ca punarnavodvāhasamaye prasādhyamānā 'tāṃ prāṅmukhīṃ tatra niveśya tanvīm' ityādyuktirbhirnavenaiva prakāreṇa nirūpitarūpasauṣṭhavā /
GK16andhvc4u:701: na ca te tasya kaverekatraivāsakṛtkṛtā varṇanaprakārā apunaruktatvena vā navanavārthanirbharatvena vā pratibhāsante /
GK16andhvc4u:702: darśitameva caitadviṣamabāṇalīlāyām--- ṇa a tāṇa ghaḍai ohī ṇa a te dīsanti kaha vi punaruttā /
GK16andhvc4u:703: je vibbhamā piāṇaṃ atthā vā sukaivāṇīṇam // //
GK16andhvc4u:704: ayamaparaścāvasthābhedaprakāro yadacetanānāṃ sarveṣāṃ cetanaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamabhimānitvaprasiddhaṃ himavadgaṅgādīnām /
GK16andhvc4u:706: yathā kumārasambhava eva parvatasvarūpasya himavato varṇanaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:707: punaḥ saptarṣipriyoktiṣu cetanatassvarūpāpekṣayā pradarśitaṃ tadapūrvameva pratibhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:709: idaṃ locanam na ca teṣāṃ ghaṭate 'vadhiḥ, na ca te dṛśyante kathamapi punaruktāḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:713: prayatnenāpi vicāryamāṇaṃ paunaruktyaṃ na labhyamiti yāvat /
GK16andhvc4u:715: bahuvallabho hi subhago rādhāvallabhaprāyastāstāḥ kāminīḥ paribhogasubhagamupabhuñjāno 'pi na vibhramapaunaruktyaṃ paśyati tadā /
GK16andhvc4u:716: etadeva priyātvamucyate, yadāha-- bālapriyā prathamasarga ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:721: te varṇanaprakārāḥ na ca bhāsanta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:725: priyāṇāṃ vibhramāḥ kathamapi punaruktā na dṛśyanta ityetadvivṛṇoti--bahuvallabha ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:729: ca prasthānaṃ kavivyutpattaye viṣamabāṇalīlāyāṃ saprapañcaṃ darśitam /
GK16andhvc4u:735: yathā--- haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitairāsajyate kūjatā- manyaḥ ko 'pi kaṣāyakaṇṭhaluṭhanādāghargharo vibhramaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:738: locanam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe yannavatāmupaiti tadeva rūpaṃ ramaṇīyatāyā iti /
GK16andhvc4u:739: priyāṇāmiti cāsaṃsāraṃ pravahadrūparo yo 'yaṃ kāntānāṃ vibhramaviśeṣaḥ sa navanava eva dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc4u:743: bālapriyā priyāṇāṃ vibhramā ityanena gamyamarthamāha---priyāṇāmiti cetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:766: yaiḥ kūjatāṃ haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu kaṣāyakaṇṭhaluṇṭhanādāghargharaḥ anyaḥ ko 'pi vibhramaḥ āsajyate āsaktaḥ kriyata ityādyanyayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:767: tacca yathāvasthitamapi tāvadupanibadhyamānamityatra tāvatpadaṃ locane vivṛṇoti--uttarakālantvityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:770: cetanānāmapi mānuṣapaśupakṣiprabhṛtīnāṃ grāmāraṇyasalilādisamedhitānāṃ parasparaṃ mahānviśeṣaḥ samupalakṣyata eva /
GK16andhvc4u:772: tathā hi---mānuṣāṇāmeva tāvaddigdeśādibhinnānāṃ ye vyavahāravyāpārādiṣu vicitrā viśeṣāsteṣāṃ kenāntaḥ śakyate gantum, viśeṣato yoṣitām /
GK16andhvc4u:779: atra kecidācakṣarin---yathā sābhānyātmanā vastūni vācyatāṃ pratipadyante na viśeṣātmanā;
GK16andhvc4u:780: tāni hi svayamanubhūtānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ tannimittānāṃ ca svarūpamanyatrāropayadbhiḥ svaparānubhūtarūpasāmānyamātrāśrayeṇopanibadhyante kavibhiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:781: na hi tairatītamanāgataṃ vartamānañca aparicitādisvalakṣaṇaṃ yogibhiriva pratyakṣīkrīyate;
GK16andhvc4u:786: tāvati tu svabhāvenaiva sā vicitreti tāvacchabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:801: ata eva sa prakāraviśeṣo yairadyatanairabhinavatvena pratīyate teṣāmabhimāna mātrameva bhaṇitakṛtaṃ vaicitryamātramatrāstīti /
GK16andhvc4u:802_0: tatrocyate--yattūktaṃ sāmānyamātrāśrayeṇa kāvyapravṛttistasya ca parimitatvena prāgeva
GK16andhvc4u:802_1: gocarīkṛtatvānnāsti navatvaṃ kāvyapravṛttistasya ca parimitatvena prāgeva gocarīkṛtatvānnāsti
GK16andhvc4u:804: yato yadi sāmānyamātramāśritya kāvyaṃ pravartate kiṅkṛtastarhi mahākavinibadhyamānānāṃ kāvyarthānāmatiśayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:805: vālmikivyatiriktasyānyasya kavivyapadeśa eva vā sāmānyavyatiriktasyānyasya kāvyārthasyabhāvāt,
GK16andhvc4u:807: uktivaicitryānnaiṣa doṣa iti cet--kimidumuktivaicitryam? uktirhi vācyaviśeṣapratipādi vacanam /
GK16andhvc4u:810: locanam pratyakṣadarśane 'pi hi--- śabdāssaṃketitaṃ prāhurvyavahārāya sa sbhṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:811: tadā svalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti saṅketastena tatra naḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:817: paryāyamātrataiva yadyuktiviśeṣastatparyāyāntarairavikalaṃ tadarthopanibandhe apaunaruktyābhimāno na bhavati /
GK16andhvc4u:823: anubhāvyānāmanubhavitavyānāṃ vastūnāmanubhavānāṃ ca yat sāmānyaṃ sāmānyasvarūpamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:832_1: kāvyavaicitryamavasthādiviśeṣātkiṃ punaruktamevāstu na cettathā tatkarthaṃ na kāvyānantyam' ityapi pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:839: vācyānāṃ ca kāvye pratibhāsamānānāṃ yadrūpaṃ tattu grāhyaviśeṣābhedenaiva pratīyate /
GK16andhvc4u:844: yato yāvānayaṃ kāvyārthānantyabhedahetuḥ prakāraḥ prāgdarśitaḥ sa sarva eva punaruktivaicitryāddviguṇatāmāpadyate /
GK16andhvc4u:847: grāhyaḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇairyo viśeṣaḥ tasya yo abhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:848: tenāyamarthaḥ--padānāntāvatsāmānye vā tadvati vāpohe vā yatra kutrāpi vastuni samayaḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:850: vākyāttadviśeṣaḥ pratīyata iti kasyātra vādino vimatiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:862: niyamena bhānayogāddhi nibhaśabdaḥ, bālapriyā kintu paunaruktyabuddhireva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:868: mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ mate sāmānye vastuni, naiyāyikamate tadvati, bauddhamate apohe samayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:880: nanu nibhapratimādiśabdānāṃ samānārthakatvāt kathaṃ ta citryamityata āha---vastuta ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:883: ralaṅkāravargaḥ prasiddha sa bhaṇitivaicitryādupanibadhyamānaḥ svayamevānavadhirdhatte punaḥ śataśākhatām /
GK16andhvc4u:884: bhaṇitiśca svabhāṣābhedena vyavasthitā satī pratiniyatabhāṣāgocarārthavaicitryanibandhanaṃ punaraparaṃ kāvyārthānāmānantyamāpādayati /
GK16andhvc4u:885: yathā mamaiva--- mahamaha itti bhaṇantau vajjadi kālo jaṇassa /
GK16andhvc4u:886: toi ṇa deu jaṇaddaṇa goarī bhodi maṇaso // //
GK16andhvc4u:887: itthaṃ yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathā na labhyate 'ntaḥ kāvyārthānām /
GK16andhvc4u:889: yatpradarśitaṃ prāk locanam tadanukāratayā tu pratimaśabda ityevaṃ sarvatra vācyaṃ kevalaṃ bālopayogi kāvyaṭīkāpariśīlanadaurātmyādeṣu paryāyatvabhrama iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:892: pratiniyatāyā bhāṣāyā gocaro vācyoyo 'rthastatkṛtaṃ yadvaicitryaṃ tannibandhanaṃ nimittaṃ yasya,
GK16andhvc4u:896: mama mama iti bhaṇato vrajati kālo heturdarśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:897: tathāpi na devo janārdano gocaro bhavati manasaḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:899: tasya kathanna devo manogocaro bhavatīti vīrodhālaṅkāracchāyā /
GK16andhvc4u:909: mama mama iti bhaṇataḥ mamāyaṃ mamedamityādi bhaṇataḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:914: mahamaha ityasya mama mama iti madhumathana iti ca chāyā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 7 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:915: ita ūrdhvaṅkārikāvṛtyorbhedasya durgrahatayā tadubhayaṃ pṛthakpradarśayan vivṛṇoti--avasthetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:933: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva // DhvK_4.10 //
GK16andhvc4u:937: yathāhi jagatprakṛtiratītakalpaparamparāvirbhūtavicitravastuprapañcā satī locanam bhūmnaiva dṛśyate lakṣye tattu bhāti rasāśrayāt // //
GK16andhvc4u:946: 'yatpradarśitaṃ prāgi'ti 'na tacchakyamapohitum' iti ca grantha ityarthaḥ // 8 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:965: atītānāṃ kalpanāṃ paramparāyāmāvirbhūntaḥ āvirbhāvitaḥ vicitrāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ prapañco yayā sā 'parī'ti /
GK16andhvc4u:973: saṃvādās tu bhavanty eva bāhulyena sumedhasām /
GK16andhvc4u:974: sthitaṃ hy etat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:976: naika-rūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // DhvK_4.11 //
GK16andhvc4u:979: sthitaṃ hyetat saṃvādinya eva medhāvināṃ buddhayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:980: kintu-- naikarūpatayā sarve te mantavyā vipaścitā // 11 //
GK16andhvc4u:981: kathamiti cet--- saṃvādo hyanyasādṛśyaṃ tatpunaḥ pratibimbavat /
GK16andhvc4u:983: saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyate yadanyena kāvyavastunā sādṛśyam /
GK16andhvc4u:986: locanam saṃvādā iti kāri kāyā ardhaṃ,
GK16andhvc4u:991: saṃvādo hy anya-sādṛśyaṃ tat punaḥ pratibimbavat /
GK16andhvc4u:1003_0: atra sumedhasāṃ saṃvādā ityasya sumedhasāṃ buddhīnāṃ kāvyānāṃ ca saṃvādā ityartha
GK16andhvc4u:1003_1: ityabhipretya 'sthitaṃ hyetadi'tyādikaṃ 'saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyata' iti ca vṛttāvuktamiti bodhyam //11 //
GK16andhvc4u:1006: ata eva vakṣyate--keṣucit pustakeṣu kārikā akhaṇḍīkṛtā eva dṛśyanta iti /
GK16andhvc4u:1007: khaṇḍīkṛtya vyākhyānaṃ tu 'saṃvādo hyanyasādṛśyam' 'saṃvādo hi kāvyārthasyocyate,
GK16andhvc4u:1016: tṛtīyaṃ tu prasiddhātma nānya-sāmyaṃ tyajet kaviḥ // DhvK_4.13 //
GK16andhvc4u:1020: tatra pūrvaṃ pratibimbakalpaṃ kāvyavastu parihartavyaṃ sumatinā /
GK16andhvc4u:1023: tṛtīyaṃ tu vibhinnakamanīyaśarīrasadbhāve sati sasaṃvādamapi kāvyavastu na tyaktavyaṃ kavinā /
GK16andhvc4u:1024: na hi śarīrī śarīriṇānyena sadṛśo 'pyeka eveti śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc4u:1029: ananyaḥ pūrvopanibandhakāvyādātmā svabhāvo yasya tadananyātma yena rūpeṇa bhāti tatprākkavispṛṣṭameva,
GK16andhvc4u:1034: evaṃ prathamaṃ prakāraṃ vyākhyāya dvitīyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tadanantarantviti /
GK16andhvc4u:1038: anukāre hyanukāryabuddhireva citrapustādāviva na tu sindūrādibuddhiḥ sphurati,
GK16andhvc4u:1043: pratibimbe anyasādṛśyaṃ śarīriṇā bimbena sādṛśyamevamālekhyākāratulyadehanośca śarīriṇā sādṛśyaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1046: nānyasāmyaṃ tyajetkavirityuktyā gamyasyārthasya vivaraṇaṃ vṛttau 'parihartavyaṃ sumatine'ti /
GK16andhvc4u:1048: tātvikaśarīraśūnyamityananyātmetyasya vivaraṇamityanyathā pratipattiḥ syādityato locane vivṛṇota--ananya ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1065: vastu bhātitarāṃ tanvyāḥ śaśi-cchāyam ivānanam // DhvK_4.14 //
GK16andhvc4u:1069: tattvasya sārabhūtasyātmanaḥ saddhāve 'nyasya pūrvasthityanuyāyyapi vastu bhātitarām /
GK16andhvc4u:1070: purāṇaramaṇīyacchāyānugṛhītaṃ hi vastu śarīravatparāṃ śobhāṃ puṣyati /
GK16andhvc4u:1073: evaṃ tāvatsasaṃvādānāṃ samudāyarūpāṇāṃ vākyārthānāṃ vibhaktāḥ sīmānaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1074: padārtharūpāṇāṃ ca vastvantarasadṛśānāṃ kāvyavastūnāṃ nāstyeva doṣa iti pratipādayitumucyate--
GK16andhvc4u:1077: nūtane sphurati kāvya-vastuni vyaktam eva khalu sā na duṣyati // DhvK_4.15 //
GK16andhvc4u:1080: nūtane sphurati kāvyavastuni vyaktameva khalu sāna duṣyati // 15 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:1081: na hi vācyaspatināpyakṣarāṇi padāni vā kānicidapūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ locanam etadeveti tṛtīyasya rūpasyātyājyatvam /
GK16andhvc4u:1086: ātmana ityasya śabdasya pūrvapaṭhitābhyāmeva tatvasya sārabhūtasyeti ca padābhyāmartho nirūpitaḥ // 14 //
GK16andhvc4u:1088: saṃvādānāmiti tu pāṭhe vākyārtharūpāṇāṃ samudāyānāṃ ye saṃvādāḥ teṣāmiti vaiyadhikaraṇyena saṃgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1089: vastuśabtadena eko vā dvau vā trayo bālapriyā etadevetyatratyaitatpadārthavivaraṇam--tṛtīyasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1090: ātmana ityasyārtho nirūpita iti sambandhaḥ tattvasya sārabhūtasyeti cātmapadārthavivaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1095: purāṇī ramaṇīyā ca yā chāyā tayānugṛhītamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1099: tāni tu tānyevopanibaddhāni na kāvyādiṣu navatāṃ virudhyanti /
GK16andhvc4u:1101: tasmāt-- yadapi tadapi ramyaṃ yatra lokasya kiñcit-sphuritamidamitīyaṃ buddhirabhyujjihīte /
GK16andhvc4u:1117: sadvṛttatejasviguṇadvijādayo hi śabdāḥ pūrvapūrvairapi kavisahasraiḥ śleṣacchāyayā nibadhyante,
GK16andhvc4u:1119: tathaiva padārtharūpāṇītyatra nāpūrvāṇi ghaṭayituṃ śakyante ityādi virudhyantītyevamantaṃ prāktanaṃ vākyamabhisandhānīyam // 15 // // //
GK16andhvc4u:1126: yadapi tadapi ramyaṃ yatra lokasya kiñci- tsphuritamidamitīyaṃ buddhirabhyujjihīte /
GK16andhvc4u:1140: yatretyasya sthāne yā tviti vā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1146: idaṃ kiñcit sphuritamitīyaṃ buddhiḥ lokasya ujjihīte ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1147: tadanugatamapi pūrvacchāyayā vastu tādṛk tādṛkṣaṃ sukavirvivakṣitavyaṅgyavācyārthasamarpaṇasamarthaśabdaracanārūpayā bandhacchāyayopanibadhnannindhatāṃ naiva yāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1148: taditthaṃ sthitam--- pratāyantāṃ vāco nimitavividhārthāmṛtarasā na sādaḥ kartavyaḥ kavibhiranavadye svaviṣaye /
GK16andhvc4u:1149: santi navāḥ kāvyārthāḥ paropanibaddhārthaviracane na kaścitkaverguṇa iti bhāvayitvā /
GK16andhvc4u:1152: sarasvaty evaiṣā ghaṭayati yatheṣṭaṃ bhagavatī // DhvK_4.17 //
GK16andhvc4u:1156: locanam anugatamipi pūrvacchāyayā vastu tādṛksukavirupanibadhnannindyatāṃ nopayati // //
GK16andhvc4u:1160: parasvādānecchetyādidvitīyaṃ ślokārdhaṃ pūrvopaskārema saha paṭhati--parasvādānecchāviratamanaso bālapriyā tatra lokasyetyādervivaraṇaṃ vṛttau 'sphuraṇeyam' ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1167: nimitāḥ tulitāḥ vividhārthāmṛtarasāḥ amṛtarasatulyāḥ vividhārthāḥ yābhiḥ tāḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:1174: kutaḥ khalvapūrvamānayamītyādicintayā viṣāda iti yāvat; na kartavyaḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:1178: 'yatheṣṭaṃ' kaveriṣṭamanatikramya iti kārikārthaṃ spaṣṭaṃ matvā svaviṣaya ityatra pūrayati locane--svayaṃ tātkālikatvenāsphurita iti /
GK16andhvc4u:1182: karikāpūrvārdhapāṭhānantaraṃ santī parasvādānecchāviratamanasaḥ sukaveḥ sarasvatyeṣā bhagavatī yatheṣṛṃ ghaṭayati vastu /
GK16andhvc4u:1183: yeṣāṃ sukavīnāṃ prāktanapuṇyābhyāsaparipākavaśena pravṛttisteṣāṃ paroparacatārthaparigrahaniḥspṛhāṇāṃ svavyāpāro na kvacidupayujyate /
GK16andhvc4u:1188: kutaḥ khalvapūrvamānayāmītyāśayena nirudyogaḥ paropanibaddhavastūpajīvako vā syādatyāśaṅkyāha--sarasvatyeveti /
GK16andhvc4u:1196: akliṣṭā rasāśrayeṇa ucitā ye guṇālaṅkārāstato yā śobhā tāṃ bibharti kāvyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1197: udyānamapyakliṣṭaḥ kālocito yo lasaḥ sekādikṛtaḥ tadāśrayastatkṛto yo guṇānāṃ saukumāryacchāyāvatvasaugandhyaprabhṛtīnamalaṅkāraḥ paryāptatākāraṇaṃ tena ca yā śobhā tāṃ bibharti /
GK16andhvc4u:1202: tasya parasvādānecchāviratamanasa ityatra viratetyanena sambandhaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1209: kārikā ca tadvṛttiśca tābhyāṃ yannirūpaṇaṃ tatprakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1211: akliṣṭeti śobhāyāḥ rasāśrayociteti guṇālaṅkārayośca viśeṣaṇamiti darśayan vyācaṣṭe--akliṣṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1219: kāvyākhye 'khilasaukhyadhāmni vibudhodyāne dhvanirdarśitaḥ so 'yaṃ kalparūpamānamahimā bhogyo 'stu bhavyātmanām //
GK16andhvc4u:1221: locanam etacca sarvaṃ pūrvameva vitatyoktamiti ślokārthamātraṃ vyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc4u:1223: ye kaṣṭopadeśenāpi vinā tathāvi dhaphalabhājaḥ tairityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1225: akhilaṃ duḥkhaleśenāpyananuviddhaṃ yatsaukhyaṃ tasya dhāmni ekāyatana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1226: sarvathā priyaṃ sarvathā ca hitaṃ durlabhaṃ jagatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1231: sthita eva san prakāśitaḥ, aprakāśitasya hi kathaṃ bhogyatvam /
GK16andhvc4u:1232: kalpataruṇā upamānaṃ yasya tādṛṅmahimā yasyeti bahuvrīhigarbho bahuvrīhiḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1237: tathāvidhāni vyutpatyādīni phalāni bhajante tadbhajanaśīlāḥ tadarhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1241: nāsti khilaṃ yasmiṃstadakhilaṃ iti bahuvrīhiścetyāśayena vivṛṇoti--duḥkhetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1251: atra kalpatarusāmyasya mahimni śabdena bodhane 'pi mahimāśraye dhvanau tasya paryavasānaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc4u:1252: kāvyaṃ nandanodyānena tulyaṃ dhvaniḥ kalpatarutulyaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1262: dhvanisvarūpaṃ tatsā tadyvākarotsahṛdayodayalābhaheto- rānandavardhana iti prathitābhidhānaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:1263: iti śrīrājānakānandavardhanācāryaviracite dhvanyāloke caturtha uddyotaḥ samāpto 'yaṃ granthaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:1265: iha bāhulyena loko lokaprasiṣyā sambhāvanāpratyayabalena pravartate /
GK16andhvc4u:1268: evaṃvidhassāro dṛśyate tasyāyaṃ ślokaprabandhastasmādādaraṇīyametadita lokaḥ pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc4u:1272: prathitaśabdenaitadeva prathitaṃ yattu bālapriyā dhakaṃ yuktajātaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1275: sahṛdayānāṃ ya udaya abhyudayaḥ dhvanisvarūpāvabodhahetukā prītiḥ tallābhasya hetoḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1278: ślokārthaṃ spaṣṭaṃ matvā vaktavyamaṃśaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---satkāvyetyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1292: sa ca sambhāvanā pratyayo bhavatīti sambandha- /
GK16andhvc4u:1302: niśreyasaprayojanādeva hi śrutātko 'pi rāgāndho yadi nivartate kimetāvatā prayojanamaprayojanamapyavaśyaṃ vaktavyameva syāt /
GK16andhvc4u:1313: yadeva nāmaśravaṇaṃ bahūnāṃ pravṛttiṃ karoti, tadeva nāmaśravaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1327: prathamodyotānte parāyā dvitīyodyotānte paśyantyāstṛtīyodyotānte madhyamāyāśca vandanaṃ kṛtavān granthakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc4u:1329: sphuṭīkṛtāni vaktrā manasi spaṣṭīkṛtāni yāni arthavaicitryāṇi vicitrārthāḥ teṣāṃ yaḥbahiḥprasaraḥ śrotṛjaneṣu prakāśaḥ taddāyinīm /
GK16andhvc4u:1336: ānandavardhanasya yo vivekaḥ vivicyatattadarthāvabodhaḥ tena vikāsī prakāśamāno yaḥ kāvyalokastasya yānyarthatatvāni sārārthāḥ teṣāṃ ghaṭanātsaṃyojanāddhetoḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1338_0: kiñca yat pronmiṣat sahṛdayeṣu prakāśamānamatha ca prakarṣeṇa unmiṣat sat sakalānāṃ
GK16andhvc4u:1338_1: sarveṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāvyādīnāṃ sadviṣayān sārārthān sakalān sadviṣayānvā atha ca sakalānāṃ
GK16andhvc4u:1338_2: sarveṣāṃ kāvyādīnāṃ sadbiṣayān sārārthān sakalān sadviṣayān vā atha ca sakalān sadviṣayān
GK16andhvc4u:1338_3: vidyamānān padārthān prakāśayatīti tathā bhavati tat tathāvidham /
GK16andhvc4u:1340: atha ca abhinavaṃ navīnāṃ guptamanyeṣāmaviditaṃ ca locanamālocanaṃ jñānaṃ netraṃ ca vyāpāryata ātmanā vyāpāritam /
GK16andhvc4u:1344: śrīmataḥ siddhicelasya tannāmnaḥ guroḥ caraṇābjaparāgaiḥ pūto yo locanam śrīsiddhicelacaraṇābjaparāgapūtabhaṭṭendurājamatisaṃskṛtabuddhileśaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1346: sajjanān kavirasau na yācate hlādanāya śaśamṛtkimarthitaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1347: naiva nindati khalānmuhurmuhuḥ dhikkṛto 'pi na hi śītalo 'nalaḥ // //
GK16andhvc4u:1349: nāśivaṃ kvacana kasyacidvacaḥ tena vaśśivamayī daśā bhavet //
GK16andhvc4u:1350: iti mahāmāheśvarābhinavaguptaviracite kāvyālokalocane caturtha udyotaḥ samāptaścāvaṃ granthaḥ //
GK16andhvc4u:1351: bālapriyā bhaṭṭendurājaḥ tasya matyā jñānena saṃskṛto buddhileśo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1353: vākyaṃ mīmāṃsāśāstraṃ, pramāṇaṃ nyāyaśāstraṃ, padaṃ vyākaraṇaśāstraṃ, tadvedināṃ gururityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1361: kuto na yācata ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntapradarśanena parihariti---śaśabhṛtkimarthita iti /
GK16andhvc4u:1365: candra iva sajjanaḥ svayameva parānāhlādayatīti candrasyeva parāhlādanaṃ sajjanasya svabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1369: khalānnaiva nindati kuta ityata āha---na hītyādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1371: na hi yathā agniḥ sarvadā uṣṇasvabhāva eva tathā khalajanaḥ paradūṣaṇasvabhāva eva,
GK16andhvc4u:1374: atha paramamāheśvaro granthakāro granthānte paramaśivānusandhānātmakaṃ paramamaṅgalamanutiṣṭhannāha---vastuta ityādi /
GK16andhvc4u:1375: janasya hṛdi hṛdaye vastutaḥ śivamaye sati śivamaye hṛdīti vā yojanā,
GK16andhvc4u:1376: sarvataḥ sarvaṃ vastu sphuṭaṃ śivamayaṃ virājate bhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1378: kvacana kvacidapi kasyacidvacaḥ aśivaṃ na bhavati, kintu sarvatra śivameva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc4u:1379: anena vastutaḥ śivamaye svasya hṛdaye sarvaṃ śivamayaṃ bhāti /
GK16andhvc4u:1384: śivamayī maṅgalamayī daśā bhavet bhavatviti sarvaṃ śivam /
GK16andhvc4u:1395: prauḍhaṃ kva locanaṃ kvāhaṃ mandadhīrbahudhātra tat /
GK16andhvc4u:1397: iti śrīsahṛdayatilaka paṇḍitarāja birudadvayaśālinā rāmanāmnā śārakeṇa viracitāyāṃ kāvyālokalocanaṭippaṇyāṃ bālapriyākhyāyāṃ caturtha udyotaḥ samāpto 'yaṃ granthaḥ //
